pullrequest.title: Implement forward/backwards multi-step for log playback

content.raw:
I can still reproduce it.

And I've noticed something else which is weird. Stepping back while paused seems to work well, but while playing, at least with the GUI, it doesn't go back one step, sometimes it even goes forward. Not sure if it's a problem with the GUI though. I'm just publishing msgs.
content.html:
I can still reproduce it.

And I've noticed something else which is weird. Stepping back while paused seems to work well, but while playing, at least with the GUI, it doesn't go back one step, sometimes it even goes forward. Not sure if it's a problem with the GUI though. I'm just publishing msgs.
